shareDialog.title: Share Note
shareDialog.publicTip: Anyone with the link can view the note
shareDialog.privateTip: This document is not public. The recipient needs to verify before reading the full text.

pdfError.formatError: PDF format is abnormal and cannot be opened. Please contact our assistant for help
pdfError.downloadError: PDF failed to download from the cloud. Please try disabling browser plugins like IDM or contact our assistant for help:

message.noTitle: The document parsing failed, unable to display title
message.pressCtrlAndScrollToZoom: Cmd/Ctrl + Scroll to Zoom in and out
message.rollbackDataTip: This content has been modified，click to rollback
message.markdownTip:
Supports Markdown
Supports ctrl/cmd+c/v pasting images
message.confirmToDeleteNoteTip: Are you sure to delete this note？
message.confirmToDeleteAnnotationTip: Are you sure to delete this annotation？
message.parsingDocumentTip: Document analysis in progress. Please wait
message.parsingDocumentFinishedTip: Analysis complete! Thank you for waiting
message.acceptToparseDocumentTip: We've received your request to analyze the PDF, and we're allocating resources. Please wait a moment
message.returnToLastReadingPositionTip: Returning to your last reading position
message.pressESCToExitFullscreenTip: Press esc to exit fullscreen mode
message.currentDocumentLocateFolders: Document saved in the following {num} locations
message.failedToLoadDataTip: Data loading error, please try again later...
message.inValidPaperTip: you can try to search it on other scholar
message.versionChangedNoteDismatchedTip: Version switched, notes may be misaligned

remindToSavePaper.title: Paper not saved
remindToSavePaper.content: You have added notes but haven't saved this paper. It is recommended to save the paper, otherwise it may be difficult to find later.

copyToPasteboard.failed: Copy failed, please manually copy the above link

message.annotionsTip1: Show sentences that have been annotated by multiple people, making it easy to quickly view key points
message.annotionsTip2: You cannot view who made the annotations, and privacy will be strictly protected
message.annotionsTip3: No other annotations on this page
message.scaleTip2: Please enter a valid percentage: not less than 50%, not more than 400%
message.searchOtherPapersH5Tip: Mobile devices do not support note viewing for the time being, please view on the PC

vocabulary.addTip: You can also quickly add the translation result here through the shortcut buttons in the translation dialog (more than 60 characters will be added to "Annotation")

aiCopilot.askSuggestions: Ask questions or request suggestions for your paper in general
aiCopilot.paperSummary: We have made a summary for this paper and summarized several questions:
aiCopilot.tip:
1. This feature is in beta, and the official launch date is to be determined
2. Each person is limited to 50 questions per day
3. After selecting the original text, the AI will automatically interpret it for you; you can also directly enter the question you want to ask in the input box below
4. AI Copilot takes about half a minute, please be patient
aiCopilot.reportTip: If possible, please tell us the reason you are not satisfied
aiCopilot.askTip: You can ask AI Copilot any questions about this paper. Enter your question here (the content is generated by AI, and there may be errors, so please refer to it cautiously. This feature is unavailable when the paper fails to be parsed by AI).
aiCopilot.screenshotTip: You can select formulas and tables for interpretation (experimental feature in beta)
aiCopilot.deleteTip: Are you sure to delete this question?
aiCopilot.waitTip: Please wait for the AI to respond
aiCopilot.errorTip: There are too many beta users at the moment, the AI is too busy, and we are working hard to allocate resources to stabilize the service. Please try again later, thank you for your patience
aiCopilot.banTip1: This feature belongs to premium versions, you are not eligible.
aiCopilot.banTip2: Get the premium version to grant access
aiCopilot.ocrTip: The OCR interpretation function performs OCR on the selected pictures and then calls AI for interpretation. Can interpret text, formulas, tables, etc.
aiCopilot.optimizedLabelTip: The quality of feedback will affect the credit of the account. You are able to use refund beans if dissatisfied when your credit is high.
aiCopilot.confirmOptimize: The beans have been automatically refunded for you, and the arrival time may be delayed.
aiCopilot.confirmOptimizeTip: In order to improve the experience, we will use more computing power to answer the current question again. This answer optimization does not require additional payment of AI beans.

teams.emptyTip: The paper is not in this group yet. Do you want to add it to [{team}] ?
teams.tip1: Confirm to add the current paper
teams.limitTip: The maximum number of words per comment is 2000!
teams.deleteTip: Are you sure to delete this discussion?

info.deleteAttachmentTip1: Are you sure to delete this attachment?
info.deleteAttachmentTip2: After the attachment is deleted, the attachment in My Library will also be deleted.
info.attachmentVipTip: Please subscribe to VIP to use it. The format of the uploaded attachment is not limited, and there is {space}MB of storage space.
info.attachmentSizeTip: Support up to {limitCount} attachments, and each file is no more than {limitMBSize}MB

translate.translateTip: Press {cmd} to select multiple paragraphs for translation
translate.placeholder: Input the text to be translated
translate.reportSuccessTip: Reported successfully, thank you for your valuable feedback
translate.emptyTip: Select the sentence with the mouse to translate automatically
translate.aiTranslateTip1: Our team has painstakingly built a large academic model with powerful natural language processing capabilities, enabling rapid and accurate understanding of complex user input in academic literature.
translate.aiTranslateTip2: This model incorporates millions of specialized subject terms, covering fields like medicine and computer science, resulting in more accurate translations and smoother expression.

tasks.errorMsg: The document cannot be recognized as a paper and is not available for learning tasks.
tasks.tip: The learning task is public content, and your answers may be seen by others.
tasks.inputLimitTip: Please enter at least 5 valid characters
tasks.pdfTip2: If the PDF version is incorrect, the uploader or the group leader/administrator needs to re-upload it in the group to replace it

report.title: Report PDF Infringement
report.content: Please send an email to {email} in the following template format. We will reply to you within 14 working days.

aiHighlighter.name: AI-Highliter
aiHighlighter.popupCt:
1. This function allows AI to automatically highlight the main points throughout the paper, enhancing reading efficiency.
2. The feature is currently in beta testing and is only visible to beta testers.
3. At present, it supports papers that are no longer than 50 pages.
4. For any questions or suggestions regarding usage, please contact our support on WeChat at: readpaper888
5. We invite you to join our beta testing group.

folder.no_classified: The following literatures have not been categorized

library.noSupportViewOther: Currently not supported for viewing other people's literature information
library.tips:
1. Support parent-child folders
2. Right click the mouse to add, move, copy, and delete
3. Support dragging and dropping
4. Click the folder icon to expand the folder
5. The same literature can be classified in multiple folders and notes can be shared
6. Non VIP can save up to 200 articles
